meanings.sent1: The refluence of the river surprised the hikers as it changed direction.
meanings.sent2: The refluence of the tide brought in debris from the sea.
meanings.sent3: The refluence of the water made the fish swim in circles, looking confused.
meanings.sent4: The refluence of memories flooded her mind, overwhelming her with nostalgia.
meanings.sent5: The refluence of emotions in his voice made it clear he was holding back tears.

meanings.sent1: The mirror showed a clear refluence of her image.
meanings.sent2: The refluence of light off the glass created a dazzling effect.
meanings.sent3: The refluence of sound in the empty room made it seem haunted.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was a refluence of happiness from seeing her old friend.
meanings.sent5: The refluence of colors in the painting gave it a vibrant look.

meanings.sent1: The refluence of the package to the sender was unexpected.
meanings.sent2: The refluence of the students to the classroom after recess was noisy.
meanings.sent3: The refluence of the dog to its owner showed its loyalty.
meanings.sent4: The refluence of the seasons brought back memories of childhood.
meanings.sent5: The refluence of the spaceship to Earth was a relief after a long journey.
